section.p: You make it safely on to the roof. Luroc nods, slapping you on the back. Silently, you both steal into the inner courtyard below, where a fountain bubbles merrily.

Lurking in the shadowed cloisters, you and Luroc descend a stairway that leads below the villa. At the bottom, you find a set of heavy bronze doors, and a guard. Fortunately, he is snoring loudly. Luroc explains that the guard has been drugged by Floril. Luroc tries the door, and it swings open - again, Floril's work. You step into the treasure chamber of Avar Hordeth.
